headline: Post-Powell speech rally: Ethereum & Opendoor among top winners
summary: US stocks (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) ended Friday's session higher, with bitcoin (BTC-USD) and ethereum (ETH-USD) also seeing significant gains. Crypto-related stocks, like Robinhood (HOOD), Coinbase (COIN), and Strategy (MSTR), and high volatility names like Opendoor (OPEN) saw price jumps. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal outlines what investors need to know about the market rally following Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's Jackson Hole remarks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Robinhood kicks off football season with new prediction markets
summary: This week on Yahoo Finance Sports Report, host Joe Pompliano takes a look at some of this week’s biggest headlines in the sports business world that you and your portfolio need to know. From the MLB’s broadcast deals with NBC (CMCSA), ESPN (DIS), and Netflix (NFLX), to the WNBA smashing attendance records, to the NFL’s latest partnership with Microsoft (MSFT), major money moves are reshaping the sports business playbook. Plus, Robinhood (HOOD) vice president and general manager of futures and international JB Mackenzie stops by the show to discuss the company’s launch of its new pro and college football prediction markets. Yahoo Finance Sports Report with Joe Pompliano, a vodcast brought to you by Yahoo Finance and Yahoo Sports, looks beyond the latest sports business headlines, analyzes all the need-to-know news - the teams, trades, and billion dollar deals - so you and your portfolio will win BIG. Yahoo Finance Sports Report is developed and produced by Lauren Pokedoff.

headline: Robinhood (HOOD) Valuation in Focus After Expanding Into Football Prediction Markets and Earning Analyst Upgrades
summary: Robinhood Markets (HOOD) just made a move that has many investors taking notice: the company is rolling out prediction markets for professional and college football, letting app users trade event contracts tied to NFL and major college games. This is not a minor feature addition; it is a bold step into the sports betting space and marks another evolution away from Robinhood’s core of commission-free equity trading. The buzz is real, not only among users but also on Wall Street. Analysts have...

headline: Japan's SBI Holdings Joins Tokenized Stock Push With Startale Joint Venture
summary: The financial conglomerate is building a blockchain platform for tokenized assets with Startale, the blockchain development firm that build Soneium with Sony.
